channel.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
channel.description: How Do I Make A Welcome Message Like "OverloadX" Did.... If You Haven't Played OverloadX The Welcome Message Comes Across The Top Of You Client.. When You First Login.. And It Only Happens Once.

item.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Google: “Tom’s Cache Suite”[/quote]now i got an error… client won’t load…? WTF!!!

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Look at the files.

Do you see classes such as Class8, or ItemDef, or Class5, or EntityDef?

As for the removal of the cached image, you will need cache suite.[/quote]Ok, I Got The Class8 And Class5 But No EntityDef or ItemDef…
And Where Do I Download A Cache suite?

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Method 348 is the drawSprite method.

If you aren’t on a refactored client, you need to remove the method348 for drawing the logo. (Or remove it from the cache)[/quote]How Do I Know If I Am On A “refactored client” And How Would I Delete It?

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Not sure which non-refactored class is for Sprites, but you would use method348 to draw the Sprite.[/quote]What Is Method348? Is That The “Runescape” Thing Or The Welcome Message?

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

Where Is method348?

ok also i searched for “sprite.drawSprite(382 - sprite.myWidth / 2 - 128, 18);” in both client and server… its not there…

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

In client.java search for:

sprite.drawSprite(382 - sprite.myWidth / 2 - 128, 18);

comment it out:

//sprite.drawSprite(382 - sprite.myWidth / 2 - 128, 18);

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Welcome Message!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]It could be a sprite being drawn, or a simple text String being written, and the login button / screen is causing some type of integer / method to change values, so it won’t show up after the first time.[/quote]I Know I Only Want It To Happen Once When You Login. And Where Do I Change The “Runescape” File?

Read full topic
